role.argrole: thing being considered or believed or evaluated

example.parse: (CONJ و) (PP-TMP (PREP في) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الوقت)) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN نفس) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))))) (SBAR-ADV (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS دلت) (NP-SBJ (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM التظاهرة))) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN شيء)))))) (PUNC ,) (PRT (RC_PART ف)) (PP (PREP على) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاصرار)) (PP (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN عدم) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN اعتبار) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (S (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الجريمة)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN منسية)))))))))) (PUNC ,)
